name: Champions Festival
rules: Once during each player's turn, if that player has 6 Pokémon in play, they may heal 10 damage from each of their Pokémon.
You may play only 1 Stadium card during your turn. Put it next to the Active Spot, and discard it if another Stadium comes into play. A Stadium with the same name can't be played.

attacks.name: Rusty Claws
attacks.text: If your opponent has exactly 1 Prize card remaining, this attack does 100 more damage.

attacks.name: Beast Raid
attacks.text: This attack does 20 damage for each of your Ultra Beasts in play.

attacks.name: Jet Needle
attacks.text: This attack's damage isn't affected by Weakness or Resistance.

attacks.name: Stinger-GX
attacks.text: Both players shuffle their Prize cards into their decks. Then, each player puts the top 3 cards of their deck face down as their Prize cards. (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

attacks.name: Photon Geyser
attacks.text: Discard all basic Psychic Energy from this Pokémon. This attack does 80 more damage for each card you discarded in this way.

attacks.name: Sky-Scorching Light-GX
attacks.text: You can use this attack only if the total of both players' remaining Prize cards is 6 or less. Put 6 damage counters on each of your opponent's Pokémon. (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

attacks.name: Tumbling Attack
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 40 more damage.

attacks.name: Spiral Drain
attacks.text: Heal 30 damage from this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Dual Splash
attacks.text: This attack does 30 damage to 2 of your opponent's Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Grand Wave
attacks.text: This Pokémon can't use Grand Wave during your next turn.

abilities.name: Electric Start
abilities.text: If you go second, and if this Pokémon is in your hand when you are setting up to play, you may put it face down as your Active Pokémon or on your Bench.

attacks.name: Double Charge
attacks.text: You may attach up to 2 basic Energy cards from your hand to 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Moon Raker
attacks.text: If the total of both players' remaining Prize cards is exactly 6, this attack can be used for Metal.

abilities.name: Search for Friends
abilities.text: When you play this Pokémon from your hand to evolve 1 of your Pokémon during your turn, you may put 2 Supporter cards from your discard pile into your hand.

attacks.name: Charge
attacks.text: Search your deck for a Lightning Energy card and attach it to this Pokémon. Then, shuffle your deck.

attacks.name: Thundering Hurricane-GX
attacks.text: Flip 4 coins. This attack does 100 damage for each heads. (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

attacks.name: Wild Fury
attacks.text: Flip a coin until you get tails. This attack does 30 more damage for each heads.

attacks.name: Destructive Cyclone-GX
attacks.text: Discard all Energy from your opponent's Active Pokémon. (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

attacks.name: Hypnoblast

attacks.text: This attack's damage isn't affected by any effects on your opponent's Active Pokémon. (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

abilities.name: Dragon Wind

attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.text: For each of your Benched Basic Pokémon, search your deck for a card that evolves from that Pokémon and put it onto that Pokémon to evolve it. Then, shuffle your deck. (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

attacks.text: This attack does 50 damage for each damage counter on your opponent's Active Pokémon. (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

name: Champions Festival
rules: Once during each player's turn, if that player has 6 Pokémon in play, they may heal 10 damage from each of their Pokémon.
You may play only 1 Stadium card during your turn. Put it next to the Active Spot, and discard it if another Stadium comes into play. A Stadium with the same name can't be played.

abilities.text: Once during your turn, if this Pokémon is your Active Pokémon, when you attach a Grass Energy card from your hand to it, you may switch 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon with their Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Forest Dump
attacks.text: CCC+ Solar Plant-GX This attack does 50 damage to each of your opponent's Pokémon. If this Pokémon has at least 2 extra Energy attached to it (in addition to this attack's cost), heal all damage from all of your Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.) (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

attacks.name: Brilliant Flare
attacks.text: You may search your deck for up to 3 cards and put them into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck. R+ Crimson Flame Pillar-GX Attach 5 basic Energy cards from your discard pile to your Pokémon in any way you like. If this Pokémon has at least 1 extra Energy attached to it (in addition to this attack's cost), your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Burned and Confused. (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

name: Champions Festival
rules: Once during each player's turn, if that player has 6 Pokémon in play, they may heal 10 damage from each of their Pokémon.
You may play only 1 Stadium card during your turn. Put it next to the Active Spot, and discard it if another Stadium comes into play. A Stadium with the same name can't be played.

attacks.name: Agility
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, prevent all effects of attacks, including damage, done to this Pokémon during your opponent's next turn.

attacks.name: Volt Tackle
attacks.text: This Pokémon does 30 damage to itself.

attacks.name: Tail Break-GX
attacks.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Paralyzed. (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

abilities.name: Ascension DNA
abilities.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), if you have a Pokémon in your hand that evolves from Eevee, you may put that card onto this Pokémon to evolve it. Before evolving, heal all damage from this Pokémon. You can't use this Ability during your first turn or the turn this Pokémon was put into play.

attacks.name: Joy Maker-GX
attacks.text: Put 3 cards from your discard pile into your hand. (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

attacks.name: Find a Friend
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, search your deck for a Pokémon, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.

attacks.name: Running Charge
attacks.text: Flip a coin until you get tails. This attack does 30 damage for each heads.

abilities.name: Spiky Shield
abilities.text: If this Pokémon is your Active Pokémon and is damaged by an opponent's attack (even if this Pokémon is Knocked Out), put 3 damage counters on the Attacking Pokémon.

attacks.name: Spiky Storm-GX
attacks.text: This attack does 100 damage to each of your opponent's Pokémon that has any damage counters on it. (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

attacks.name: Aromax
attacks.text: Heal all damage from 1 of your benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Leaf Blade
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 40 more damage.

attacks.name: Snow Cloak
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, prevent all effects of attacks, including damage, done to this Pokémon during your opponent's next turn.

attacks.name: Hypnotic Blizzard
attacks.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Asleep. This attack does 20 damage to each of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

abilities.name: High Density Armor
abilities.text: If this Pokémon has full HP, it takes 90 less damage from your opponent's attacks (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Ground Crush
attacks.text: The Defending Pokémon can't retreat during your opponent's next turn.

attacks.name: Stone Age-GX
attacks.text: Put any number of Pokémon that evolve from Unidentified Fossil from your discard pile onto your bench. (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

attacks.name: Psychic Club
attacks.text: This attack does 30 more damage for each of your Benched Psychic Pokémon. PCC+ Cross Division-GX Put 10 damage counters on your opponent's Pokémon in any way you like. If this Pokémon has at least 3 extra Energy attached to it (in addition to this attack's cost), put 20 damage counters on them instead. (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

attacks.name: Black Lance
attacks.text: This attack does 60 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon-GX or Benched Pokémon-EX. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.) C+ Dark Moon-GX Your opponent can't play any Trainer cards from their hand during their next turn. If this Pokémon has at least 5 extra Darkness Energy attached to it (in addition to this attack's cost), your opponent's Active Pokémon is Knocked Out. (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

abilities.name: Ascension DNA
abilities.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), if you have a Pokémon in your hand that evolves from Eevee, you may put that card onto this Pokémon to evolve it. Before evolving, heal all damage from this Pokémon. You can't use this Ability during your first turn or the turn this Pokémon was put into play.

attacks.name: Joy Maker-GX
attacks.text: Put 3 cards from your discard pile into your hand. (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

attacks.name: Regiblast
attacks.text: Discard the top card of your opponent's deck.

attacks.name: Yank Out
attacks.text: Discard random cards from your opponent's hand until they have 5 cards in their hand.

attacks.name: Tail Smash
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing.

attacks.name: Psybeam
attacks.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Confused.

attacks.name: Nohahex
attacks.text: If your opponent's Active Pokémon has exactly 9 damage counters on it, that Pokémon is Knocked Out.

name: Sabrina & Brycen
rules: Search your deck for up to 2 basic Energy cards, reveal them, and put them into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.When you play this card, you may discard 5 other cards from your hand. If you do, you may also search for up to 3 Pokémon of different types in this way.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

attacks.name: Outrage
attacks.text: This attack does 10 more damage for each damage counter on this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Flare Strike
attacks.text: This Pokémon can't use Flare Strike during your next turn. RRR+ Double Blaze-GX 200+ If this Pokémon has at least 3 extra Fire Energy attached to it (in addition to this attack's cost), this attack does 100 more damage, and this attack's damage isn't affected by any effects on your opponent's Active Pokémon. (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

attacks.name: Full Blitz
attacks.text: Search your deck for up to 3 Lightning Energy cards and attach them to 1 of your Pokémon. Then, shuffle your deck. LLL+ Tag Bolt-GX 200 If this Pokémon has at least 3 extra Lightning Energy attached to it (in addition to this attack's cost), this attack does 170 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.) (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)
